section.title: Leap.Unity.IIndexable< T > Interface Template Reference

para.para: This easy-to-implement interface represents the ability to index into a collection of elements of type T. IIndexables inherit Query() via an extension method.

section.title: Detailed Description
section.para: This easy-to-implement interface represents the ability to index into a collection of elements of type T. IIndexables inherit Query() via an extension method.
IIndexable is fire-and-forget if your implementer is a reference type (class). If the implementing type is a struct, be mindful of boxing, and consider using IIndexableStruct and pooling instead.
